roleset.name: to command or direct
roleset.note: CAPTAIN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'captain' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from captain.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Nomura , the world 's biggest securities company largely by virtue of its protected home field , and Industrial Bank of Japan , Japan 's most innovative and aggressive bank in capital markets abroad , captain the opposing sides .
example.arg: Nomura , the world 's biggest securities company largely by virtue of its protected home field , and Industrial Bank of Japan , Japan 's most innovative and aggressive bank in capital markets abroad ,
